title: Growing the Seeds of Love
description:
After eavesdropping on one another's converZations with PVK, and other Randos, Jess and Jeff finally have one together.  They talk raising kids in the meaning crisis, John Vervaeke's gorgeous presentation of Agape, U shaped stories, and trees.

John Vervaeke's lecture: Ep. 16 - Awakening from the Meaning Crisis - Christianity and Agape
https://youtu.be/Jbwm03djuJc
